Title: Spring Training 2021: Andrew Vaughn Hopes To Make Opening Day Roster For Sox, Ian Happ Expected To Lead Off For Cubs
Description: CBS 2's Luke Stuckmeyer reports as Spring Training practices continue in Arizona for the Cubs and White Sox. SUV That Hit And Killed Woman In Englewood May Have Been Target Of Police PursuitA mother of three was struck and killed while walking just a few blocks from her home in Englewood Monday afternoon.
Author: CBS Local
